CONTRACTING_BODY.CA_TYPE_OTHER: Private Company Limited by Guarantee with Charitable Status

SHORT_DESCR.P: To provide screen specialist consultancy services to Scottish independent production companies participating in the FOCUS project.

FOCUS is a two-year pilot project to provide expert, sector-specific business support to screen production companies in Scotland, providing up to 20 small and medium-sized companies operating in Scotland's screen industry to access sector-specific business advice and support.
Full details provided within the Tender Documentation.

Scripted; non-scripted; story-finding; story development; screenplay development; ideas and format generation; writing and pitching proposals; commissioning processes; development funding; new talent.
Games, Mobile, Web, CGI, VR and AR. Content creation; development; production; funding; distribution; commissioning; innovation.
Distribution; sales; tax; private and public-sector funding; company investment; production finance; co-production; crowdfunding; accounting.
Recruitment; head-hunting; organisational development; training; mentoring.
Media and entertainment law; contracts; rights; exploitation; rights negotiation; music licences.
Strategic vision; leadership styles; operational and strategic tasks; team development; communication; negotiation; succession planning; delegation; cultural practices.
Publishing; agents; authors; story and script development; markets; international insights; broadcasters.
Audience development; audience insight; communications/PR; advertising; branding; digital and social media; merchandising.
Scripted; non-scripted; co-production; budgeting; production finance; locations; casting and crewing.
Market intelligence; formats; rights and IP; franchising; aggregators; new and archive products; film festivals; digital sales; territories; international licences.
Adaptations; script-editing; story development; script development; trans-media; single drama/series; regional and international.

ADDRESS_CONTRACTOR.ADDRESS: The Coach House, Pinewood Studios, Pinewood Road
Locks Mead, Malthouse Lane, malthouse lane

INFO_ADD.P: Suppliers are advised to allow adequate time for uploading documents and to dispatch the electronic response well in advance of the closing time to avoid any last minute problems.
